message:
Ikhwan, a perfect journey to Islam 

The world islamic movement must be inspired and can derive materials for solid islamic movement from Ikhwaan-ul-Muslemeen.They are now in a stage that they will be able to call a total social revolution in line of islam and have a preparation to partake democratic process as a leading force to show the beauty of islam both.Ikhwan has built this capacity not in day but through a long journey for ages with tremendous sacrifice like Abraham,show patience according to described inS Surat Al-Asr,faces great loss of wealth and lives individual and collectively,exile,torture,ban and many more.So it is enough to say that it is fool-hardy to raise voice saying jihad,jihad,jiahad without doing such job for the revolution.These people can neither understand jihad nor khilafa.Ikhwaan is doing the greatest jihad holding the entire form of jihad or in a word stiriving to establish islam in the society as complete way of life for centuries.Next later.

by Mohammad Nezam uddin. 
(ফ্যান পোস্ট)
